医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为什么为幼儿寻找新冠疫苗仍然如此困难？ 9 月 12 日，疾病控制与预防中心建议 6 个月及以上的所有人进行下一轮新冠疫苗注射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74f85203-33d6-4e18-b4d3-05c7ef6a8d7a Fri, 20 Oct 2023 14:30:00 -0400 Why is finding covid shots for young children still so hard?
让我们诚实地讨论一下随着年龄的增长会发生什么我们中有多少人想要一本可靠的、基于证据的衰老指南，来解释随着年龄的增长，我们的身体和思想如何变化，以及如何适应这些差异？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0671f33-cb01-42a6-ad09-449c9e72ce87 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 11:48:37 -0400 Let’s have an honest conversation about what to expect as you age
不良的童年经历会对心理和情绪健康产生长期影响不良童年经历（ACE）被定义为一系列压力或创伤性事件，包括虐待、忽视或家庭功能障碍（患有精神疾病或入狱的亲戚、目睹家庭暴力等）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Adverse-childhood-experiences-have-long-term-impact-on-mental-and-emotional-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Adverse-childhood-experiences-have-long-term-impact-on-mental-and-emotional-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e56810b4-8e54-4c89-86e6-95b908d98cea Fri, 20 Oct 2023 10:11:00 -0400 Adverse childhood experiences have long-term impact on mental and emotional health
儿童心理健康危机在大流行期间急剧上升并持续存在威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会研究人员的一项研究表明，在大流行期间，需要急诊科护理的儿童和青少年的心理健康危机急剧上升，尽管恢复正常，但仍居高不下。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pediatric-mental-health-crisis-skyrocketed-and-persisted-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pediatric-mental-health-crisis-skyrocketed-and-persisted-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f90ce1a-a6c4-4dc5-b1e7-2eca4a473385 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:58:00 -0400 Pediatric mental health crisis skyrocketed and persisted during the pandemic
瞳孔大小可以预测 TMS 治疗抑郁症的反应加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心研究人员的新发现表明，测量瞳孔对光反应的变化可以帮助预测抑郁症的恢复情况，并个性化经颅磁刺激 (TMS) 治疗重度抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pupil-size-may-predict-response-to-TMS-treatment-for-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pupil-size-may-predict-response-to-TMS-treatment-for-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f76b0853-e871-41e5-a621-3c23f597384b Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:53:00 -0400 Pupil size may predict response to TMS treatment for depression
DASH 饮食可能有助于保护女性晚年的认知功能一项新的研究发现，在中年期间采取旨在降低血压的饮食的女性，几十年后出现记忆力减退和其他认知能力下降迹象的可能性会降低约 17%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/DASH-diet-may-help-preserve-cognitive-function-in-women-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/DASH-diet-may-help-preserve-cognitive-function-in-women-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4964865e-31cb-4116-aca7-e8c781f99da7 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:47:00 -0400 DASH diet may help preserve cognitive function in women later in life
地中海饮食和运动：改变身体成分的强大组合地中海饮食加上体力活动可能有助于临床改善身体成分https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Mediterranean-diet-and-exercise-A-powerful-combo-for-transforming-body-composition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Mediterranean-diet-and-exercise-A-powerful-combo-for-transforming-body-composition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec27bfa5-54e8-4b63-91be-f4d479e5a238 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:40:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet and exercise: A powerful combo for transforming body composition
研究肠道微生物组的新方法为新的医疗机会打开了大门肠道内的物种越多样化，对您的健康就越好。现在，由哈德逊医学研究所领导的一个国际团队找到了一种方法来确定哪些物种是重要的，以及它们如何相互作用以创建健康的微生物组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-method-to-study-gut-microbiome-opens-door-to-new-medical-opportunities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-method-to-study-gut-microbiome-opens-door-to-new-medical-opportunities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d180ddc4-d0eb-4731-b4c3-9ca9dd7f9f17 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:30:00 -0400 New method to study gut microbiome opens door to new medical opportunities
犬类传播模型深入了解了 COVID-19 对人类大脑的神经影响SARS-CoV-2 对哺乳动物神经系统造成的组织病理学改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Canine-transmission-models-provide-insights-into-the-neurological-impacts-of-COVID-19-on- human-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Canine-transmission-models-provide-insights-into-the-neurological-impacts-of-COVID-19-on- human-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=388b755c-c235-4a49-9975-27c8a5aeb133 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:20:00 -0400 Canine transmission models provide insights into the neurological impacts of COVID-19 on human brains
加州领先于 FDA 禁止常见糖果添加剂加州的万圣节糖果可能会焕然一新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/California-Moves-Ahead-Of-The-FDA-In-Banning-Common-Candy-Additives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/California-Moves-Ahead-Of-The-FDA-In-Banning-Common-Candy-Additives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d479cb36-6010-449c-a98f-b252493b7139 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:09:00 -0400 California moves ahead of the FDA in banning common candy additives
